attributes.action: When covid officially goes, we should all have a national holiday.
attributes.background: Let everyone celebrate and enjoy life once again

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make June 25th. 2021 an "Australian Christmas" bank holiday.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554630

Extra Bank Holiday when Covid restrictions are finally lifted
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563958
